scripts.build: babel src -d lib && node_modules/.bin/webpack lib/options.js dist/options.js --output-library-target umd && node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs dist/options.js -o ./dist/options.min.js
scripts.clean: rimraf lib && rimraf packages/*/lib && rimraf test/**/coverage && lerna clean --yes
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:build && gh-pages -d examples/element-ui --remote eleme && del examples/element-ui
scripts.deploy:build: npm run build:file && cooking build -c build/cooking.demo.js -p && echo element.eleme.io>>examples/element-ui/CNAME
scripts.dev: npm run bootstrap && npm run build:file && cooking watch -c build/cooking.demo.js -p
scripts.dev:play: npm run build:file && cross-env PLAY_ENV=true cooking watch -c build/cooking.demo.js -p
scripts.dist: npm run clean && npm run build:file && npm run lint && cooking build -c build/cooking.conf.js,build/cooking.common.js,build/cooking.component.js -p && npm run build:utils && npm run build:umd && npm run build:theme
scripts.pub: npm run bootstrap && sh build/git-release.sh && sh build/release.sh
scripts.pub:all: npm run dist:all && lerna publish --skip-git && git commit -am 'publish independent packages' && git push eleme dev
scripts.test: npm run lint && cross-env CI_ENV=/dev/ karma start test/unit/karma.conf.js --single-run
